holidays.title: Hedgehog Day
holidays.description: Hedgehogs are painfully cute (literally). Discover what it's like to have one of these cuties.

holidays.title: National Bubble Gum Day
holidays.description: Kids learn about the value of charity and break the classic "no-gum" rule.

holidays.title: National Tater Tot Day
holidays.description: Did you know they are considered "fine dining?" Read on for some crunchy facts!

holidays.title: National Ukulele Day
holidays.description: Ukulele players from around the country strum their favorite tunes to celebrate.

holidays.title: National Wear Red Day
holidays.description: Put on your reddest red and paint the city red, for a great cause!

holidays.title: Ayn Rand Day
holidays.description: Prepare for a philosophy lesson because we are going to talk about the person who introduced Objectivism.

holidays.title: Bubblegum Day
holidays.description: Chew your favorite bubblegum, practice your bubble blowing and give back this Bubblegum Day.

holidays.title: California Kiwifruit Day
holidays.description: It’s California Kiwifruit Day! People should know more about the health benefits of eating kiwifruits.

holidays.title: Candlemas Day
holidays.description: On Candlemas Day, many of the faithful bring candles to their churches to be blessed.

holidays.title: Crepe Day
holidays.description: Ready your forks and knives as we celebrate a truly classic and delicious treat.

holidays.title: Feast of Candelaria
holidays.description: Ready your hearts and minds as we celebrate one of Bolivia’s most important days.

holidays.title: Give Kids A Smile
holidays.description: Let's turn those frowns upside down with the "Give Kids A Smile" program.

holidays.title: Groundhog Job Shadow Day
holidays.description: Ready yourselves as we mark a day set aside to benefit both employers and potential employees.

holidays.title: Marmot Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate one of Alaska’s most cherished animals with us.

holidays.title: National Brendan Day
holidays.description: Remind everyone that it’s your name day today, and you deserve some pampering.

holidays.title: National Brown Dog Day
holidays.description: Our ideas will have you and your pooch paw-sitively howling with joy!

holidays.title: National Catchers Day
holidays.description: Catchers are one of the most important positions in baseball and softball.

holidays.title: National Frank Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Frank Day today with as many Frank puns as you can!

holidays.title: National Heavenly Hash Day
holidays.description: Get your bowls and spoons ready as we celebrate one of the world’s most exquisite treats.

holidays.title: National River Day
holidays.description: It’s time to celebrate and learn more about the unique name, River!

holidays.title: National Woman's Heart Day
holidays.description: Pledge to protect a woman’s life by protecting her from cardiovascular diseases.

holidays.title: Number Day
holidays.description: Every childhood is worth fighting for. Join us in the fight against child abuse.

holidays.title: Rheumatoid Arthritis Awareness Day
holidays.description: Understand Rheumatoid Arthritis, treatment options, symptoms, and medications that can help us.

holidays.title: Self Renewal Day
holidays.description: Self Renewal Day is the perfect opportunity for self-care. Join us as we take part.

holidays.title: Sled Dog Day
holidays.description: Get ready to sled through the best celebrations with us this Sled Dog Day.

holidays.title: The Record of a Sneeze Day
holidays.description: Fred Ott is recognized as the first man captured sneezing in a legal motion picture.

holidays.title: Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo
holidays.description: The Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo ended the U.S./Mexico war over Texas and border disputes.

holidays.title: Working Naked Day
holidays.description: It is harder than we think to work in our most comfortable state and remain productive.

holidays.title: World Wetlands Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate all aspects of the wetlands with the best events and tips.

holidays.title: Shakira’s Birthday
holidays.description: Shakira is a multi-award-winning singer, philanthropist, and talented performer who’s won over the hearts of millions.
